panel.name: center_circle
panel.visibility: not is_video 'active' ? var_not_equal '@$jogcoverart' 1 ? true : not loaded : 0

menu.tooltip: SKIN LAYOUT\nSelect the layout adapted to your mixing style

button.tooltip: AUDIO\nShow the audio (mixer) controls, like equalizers, gain, level, pfl, etc
MASTER\nShow some general controls, like record/broadcast, microphone, or master volume

text.color: `songpos_remain 60000ms ? songpos_remain 30000ms ? blink ? color 'red' : color 75% 'red' : blink ? color 75% '#9b9b9b' : color '#9b9b9b' : color '#9b9b9b'`
`songpos_remain 60000ms ? songpos_remain 30000ms ? blink ? color 'red' : color 75% 'red' : blink ? color 75% '#9b9b9b' : color '#9b9b9b' : color '#9b9b9b'`

button.action: holding ? delete_cue 1 & set_cue 1 : has_cue 1 ? goto_cue 1 : set_cue 1
holding ? delete_cue 1 & set_cue 1 : has_cue 1 ? goto_cue 1 : set_cue 1
